name: Terraform Cloud (Enterprise)
overview: Trigger Terraform runs when resources changes in LaunchDarkly.
description: Send resource change events directly to Terraform Cloud's Runs API to trigger runs in Terraform Cloud (Enterprise).
author: LaunchDarkly Labs

formVariables.name: Terraform Enterprise Host Name
formVariables.description: Enter your Terraform Enterprise host name in the format https://HOST_URL.

formVariables.name: Terraform User / Team Token
formVariables.description: Enter your Terraform Enterprise [user token or team token](https://www.terraform.io/cloud-docs/users-teams-organizations/users#creating-a-token).

formVariables.name: Workspace ID
formVariables.description: Enter the ID of the Terraform workspace you want runs to trigger for based on the policy below.
